Literature.Title: Novel Arginine End-Tagging Antimicrobial Peptides to Combat Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria
Literature.Author: Zhang L, Wu Y, Wei N, Yang F, Wang M, Fei C, Liu Y, Xue F, Gu F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus SH230(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8099(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli XJ16-1(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 8014(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0385(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0911(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.9201(MIC=>64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
